original_title: Sri Lanka Rupee weakens against USD
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Sri Lankan rupee has weakened against the US Dollar once again.
The Bank of Ceylon selling rate on Thursday (15) was Rs. 335.60/-. The Buying rate was Rs. 315/-
According to the data made availble by the Central Bank of Sri Lanka the selling rate of the USD was Rs. 328.92/- and the bying rate was Rs. 311.69/-.
